name: brackets-builder
title: Brackets Builder
description: Allow to run build programs (such as running Python/Ruby/Node/etc scripts) from Brackets and display results in panel. It is possible to create own build systems via 'Edit>Edit Builder' menu item and editing opened JSON-file (you need to restart Brackets). Press F9 to build current file.
author: Ghaxx <kanngaxx@gmail.com>
